string.text: Kryvavy Pacałunak

Kryvavy Pacałunak - heta miechanika, jakaja dazvalaje ‘Čałavieku pieratvarycca ŭ {TOR_VAMPIRE}. Pieratvareńnie daje pieravahi i niedachopy rasy.{newline}{newline} Dziela atrymańnia Kryvavaha Pacałunka, nieabchodna dałučycca da frakcyi Vampiraŭ, atrymacać dastatkovuju viadomaść i pahavaryć z lidaram frakcyi, jaki prapanuje pieratvareńnie ŭ Vampira.
Stvareńnie Piersanaža

Vampir:{newline} Kali vy žadajecie pačać hulniu ŭ jakaści Vampira, to padčas stvareńnia piersanaža treba abrać opcyju Vampir Šlachcič, jakaja budzie apošnim vybaram pierad zahruzkaj na mapu kampanii. Heta taksama dazvolić abrać liniju kryvi. Vy abo pačniecie svaje pryhody ŭ jakaści Hrafa-Vampira, abo Kryvavaha Rycara.{newline}{newline} Vampiryzm daje ŭnikalny nabor bonusaŭ i zdolnaściaŭ adpačatku hulni: vy pačynajecie sa zdolnaściu Uźniaćcie Miortvych, možacie chutčej ruchacca nočču. Vy bolš sprytny za čałavieka.{newline} Źviarnicie ŭvahu, vy taksama sutykniociesia z niedachopami, naprykład, budziecie ruchacca pavolniej dniom. Adpačatku jak Vampira vas budzie nienavidzieć Impieryja i bolšaść inšych frakcyjaŭ žyvych.{newline}{newline} Niekramant:{newline} Kali vy žadajecie pačać hulniu ŭ jakaści Niekramanta, to padčas stvareńnia piersanaža abiarycie opcyju Niekramant-Navik, jakaja musić na adnoj z apošnich staronak stvareńnia piersanaža. Kali vy abiarecie hetuju opcyju, to trapicie na mapu z dostupam da mahii Niekramancija i zdolnaściu Uźniaćcie Miortvych paśla bitvaŭ dziela papaŭnieńnia svajho vojska.{newline}{newline} Čaraŭnik/Zaklinalnik{newline} Dziela pačynańnia hulni ŭ jakaści zaklinalnika (heta tyčycca bolšaści frakcyjaŭ), treba abrać padčas stvareńnia piersanaža słušnuju finalnuju opcyju, u apisańnie jakoj budzie aznačana ‘dazvalaje vykarystoŭvać mahiju.{newline}{newline} Naprykład, dla Impieryi abrańnie napačatku hulni Akalita Koledža daść dostup da mahii. Paśla zahruzki mapy kampanii adkryjecca vakno, u jakim budzie lha abrać mahiju, na jakoj vy žadajecie śpiecyjalizavacca, i z hetaha momantu vy zmožacie hulać u kampaniju jak zvyčajna, majučy dostup da šeraha pačatkovych zaklonaŭ. Natatka: jak čałaviek (za vyniatkam Cnatliŭki, hladzicie {TOR_CAREERS}) vy NIA MOŽACIE znać bolš za adnyja viedy mahii.{newline}{newline} Śviatar i Cnatliŭka Łedzi{newline} Karjeru Śviatara lha abrać napačatku hulni. Jany vałodajuć bolš mocnymi malitvami (hladzicie {TOR_PRAYERS}).{newline}{newline}{newline} Vandroŭny Rycar{newline} Rycar Bretońnii adna z unikalnych {TOR_CAREERS}, jakuju vy možacie abrać padčas hulni za Bretońniju.{newline}{newline}{newline} Standartnyja nałady:{newline} Vybar usiakaj inšaj karjery napačatku vašaj kampanii daść vam dośvied padobny na vanilny, vy pačniocie hulniu z ryštunkam, što adpaviadaje vašamu vybaru, i zmožacie stvaryć svaju ŭłasnuju historyju z nula. Kali nijakaja karjera nie abrana napačatku, vy pačniocie hulniu z karjeraj Najmit, jakaja daje svaje pieravahi (hladzicie {TOR_CAREERS}).{newline}{newline}{newline}

Karjery - heta sistema, jakuju lha vykarystoŭvać jak dla rolevaj hulni, hetak i dla raźvićć piersanaža. Jana daje ŭnikalnyja navyki i bonusy ŭ zaležnaści ad abranaj śpiecyjalizacyi. Hetyja ‘karjery padobnyja na drevy navykaŭ, jakija patrabujuć dasiahnieńnia peŭnych vyčynaŭ, što dazvalajuć ruchacca pa leśvicy, naprykład, atrymać dadatkovyja ački zdaroŭja, pavialičyć škodu ci partyjnyja bafy, źviazanyja z henaj karjeraj.{newline}{newline} Ački Navykaŭ, jakija nieabchodny dla prasoŭvańnia pa karjery, nabyvajucca šlacham atrymańnia roŭniaŭ bazavaj sistemy Bannerlord. Za kožny rovień vašy piersanaž atrymlivaje 1 ačko Karjery.{newline}{newline} Miarkujecca, što padčas hulni vy budziecie śpiecyjalizavacca na adnoj karjery, ale budzie mahčymaść pierachoda da inšaj karjery, ale z peŭnymi štrafami, naprykład, strataj usich zaroblenych zdolnaściaŭ. Vam buduć viernutyja ački navykaŭ, kab vy mahli prasunucca pa abranaj vami novaj karjery.{newline}{newline} Pamiatajcie: źmiena karjery moža pryvieści da straty mahii, malitvaŭ ci zdolnaściaŭ. Heta moža źnizić ahulnuju bajavuju moc. Na hety momant źmianić karjery lha tolki z dapamohaj {TOR_BLOODKISS} budučy Najmitam.{newline}{newline} Na hety momant isnujuć nastupnyja drevy navykaŭ Karjeraŭ: Rycar Hraala, Kryvavy Rycar, Śviatar-Vajar, Najmit, Hraf-Vampir i Cnatliŭka. Kožnaje ź ich maje svajo ŭnikalnaje i adpaviednaje tematykie raźvićcio, jakoje ažyciaŭlajecca z dapamohaj unikalnaha dreva Karjernych Navykaŭ na ekranie Piersanaža ŭ pravym vierchnim kucie.{newline}{newline} Kožnaja karjera padzialajecca na 3 ranha, usiaki ranh dazvalaje abrać asablivyja pieravahi. Viarški hetych pieravah varjirujucca ad prostych pasiŭnych bafaŭ da bolš prasunutych i ŭnikalnych dla peŭnaj karjery.{newline}{newline} Karjernyje Zdolnaści:{newline} Niekatoryja karjery majuć admysłovyja zdolnaści, jakija dazvalajuć atrymać unikalnyja časovyja bajavyja bafy albo ŭnikalnyja navyki dziejańniaŭ, naprykład, pieratvareńnie ŭva imhłu dla Vampira.{newline}{newline}{newline} Bazavaja Karjera:{newline}{newline} Najmit{newline} - Bajavyja bonusy blizkaha i dalokaha boju{newline} - Moža zarablać dadatkovyja hrošy za peŭnych vorahaŭ i kantrakty{newline} - Bonusy dla univiersalnych vajaroŭ{newline}{newline}{newline} Impieryja:{newline}{newline} Śviatar-Vajar Zihmara{newline} - Śviatar z bafami i niekatorymi atakujučymi zdolnaściami - Zmahar blizkaha boju z mocnymi navykami vyžyvańnia{newline} - Pieravahi ad ŭsich Vajaroŭ-Zihmarytaŭ{newline}{newline}{newline} Bretońnija{newline}{newline} Bretoński Rycar{newline} - Mocny rycar z fokusam na konnym boi{newline} - Śviataja i fizyčnaja škoda{newline} - Uzmacnieńni konnaha boju i rycaraŭ{newline}{newline} Cnatliŭka Łedzi{newline} - Mahička sa zdolnaściami malitvaŭ{newline} - Uzmacnieńni i bafy dla Bretońskich vajaroŭ{newline} - Moža karystacca 3 škołami Mahii{newline}{newline}{newline} Vampirskija Kryvavyja Linii{newline}{newline} Hrafstvy-Vampiraŭ{newline} - Vy majecie zdolnaść ‘ryŭka u svajoj zdolnaści imhlistaja forma padčas boju{newline} - Vy možacie karystacca Niekramancijaj{newline} - Vy možacie karystacca dvuma viedami (škołami) mahii padčas hulni{newline}{newline} Kryvavy Rycar{newline} - Nia moža karystacca mahijaj, ale mocny zmahar blizkaha boju z vialikim zdaroŭjem{newline} - Dostup da mocnych adzinak, Kryvavych Rycaraŭ, šlacham pošuka vartych supiernikaŭ{newline} - Bronieprabivalnyja ataki na poźniaj stadyi hulni{newline}
Kampańjony

Companions within our mod have been changed to be better suited to our setting, however, at this time the recruitment and interaction with these Companion NPCs remain primarily unchanged. They are found in taverns and recruited with a single payment, exactly as in Vanilla Bannerlord.{newline} {newline} Also like Vanilla, these companions are generic and their differences will be in their equipment, skills and ‘special abilities, such as access to magic or prayers which only the relevant companion type will have.{newline} {newline} The one notable difference is that faction-specific companions, such as Vampires, will be found solely in their appropriate territory. Such as Vampire companions being found in Sylvanian taverns, Warrior Priests within the Empire.{newline} {newline} The companion types at the moment can include Warrior Priests, Knights, Magic Casters, Vampires and more.{newline}
Cursed Locations

As a Vampire or Necromancer, you can interact with certain ‘cursed locations on the campaign map, these will allow you to summon undead units but the ritual can only be performed once a day. A primary example of a cursed location would be within the swamps of Sylvania or Mousillon, these locations will cause attrition (damage to the troops/heroes) to the travelling party and healing wont be possible until the area has been left. Over time these negative effects will grow stronger.{newline} {newline} As a non-vampire or necromancer character, you can interact with these locations in a different way by conducting a warding ritual. This ritual will, temporarily, stop the recruitment of undead units by undead factions and will remove the negative penalties to the player, and any ‘good factions, related to the cursed location. To perform this ritual your party must have 9 people and some will take damage during the process.{newline} {newline}
Damage System

We have implemented our own damage system which takes into account a variety of factors during battles, such as unit types and the damage or resistance modifiers being used by individual characters. The damage system works in exchange with the base Bannerlord physics-based damage system. A mighty well-timed blow will be further enhanced by magical and other non-physical effects. On the other side, magical resistances, like ethereal units take less damage from non-magic weapons.{newline} {newline} Damage types{newline} - Physical - regular damage dealt from any weapon and sometimes spells. {newline} - Magical - most spells deal magical damage. {newline} - Fire - dealt by special guns and most bright wizard spells. {newline} - Holy damage applies for most prayer abilities, or even certain holy warriors.{newline} - Lighting - Heaven wizards and higher damsels make use of this damage type.{newline} {newline} Damage proportions{newline} If a certain weapon or unit type is in possession of non-physical damage effects, their damage can be split into categories, for example spells deal full damage, aligned to the element of the magic in use.{newline} {newline} Buffs, Debuffs and resistances{newline} Certain magical gear or abilities can enhance damage dealt, reduce damage taken or enhance a particular damage type. In a playthrough you may be able to both enhance the use of fire magic while also reducing damage taken from dark magic. It is important to note that resistances and damage buffs must match the damage type they are blocking or enhancing.{newline} {newline} Attack types{newline} Certain buffs and spells are only beneficial for certain attack types, which can be Spell damage, melee damage, or ranged damage. Only benefits that match the attack type, will be considered for the hit. {newline} {newline} Wardsave{newline} A special form of resistance is the Wardsave. The Wardsave acts last on the damage calculation, reducing the overall damage by a certain number. {newline} {newline} Damage calculation{newline} For a more detailed explanation of the damage calculation please head over to our discord.{newline} {newline} {newline}

One of the major features in our mod is the use of artillery in battles, this has been tied to the Engineering skill of players. Levelling your engineering skill will give you access to the acquiring and use of artillery on the field, once the player reaches level 50 Engineering they are able to purchase artillery from their respective faction. Every additional 50 levels of Engineering allow the player to field an additional piece of artillery.{newline} {newline} The location, or means, of acquiring {TOR_ARTILLERY} will differ between each faction.{newline} {newline}

Cannons:{newline} The player can acquire Cannons from the Imperial city of Nuln, after speaking to the Master Engineer NPC found in the city. Cannons are only available for the Empire and have a number of requirements, to access the purchase screen alone a quest must first be completed, given by the Master Engineer. To buy and use the cannons the player must then have 50 engineering, must be part of an Imperial faction and must have artillery crew in their party. Every additional 50 levels of Engineering allow the player to field an additional Cannon.{newline} {newline} Field Trebuchets:{newline} The player can acquire Field Trebuchets in Bretonnian towns with Wood Workshops by accessing the Trade menu. This powerful piece of artillery requires the player to have at least 50 Engineering and some artillery crew in the party. The crew needs to be assigned to a placed Trebuchet during the battle to properly operate siege weaponry. Every additional 50 levels of Engineering allow the player to field an additional Trebuchet.{newline} {newline} {newline}

One of our {TOR_ATTRIBUTES}, Gunpowder, is of course tied to the use of weapons like handguns, the player must use handguns or other black-powder weapons in battles to level up their Gunpowder skill. Purchasing these weapons can be done once the player joins an imperial faction, hits level 50 in Engineering and completes the quest given by the Master Engineer in Nuln or the normal trade menu in cities.{newline} {newline} Finding and looting lower-quality guns is an excellent way to begin this process early on. {newline}
Magic Introduction

Magic and Necromancy share many similar features, they can both be accessed during character creation by selecting the relevant choices and they can also both be accessed by a non-magic character during a playthrough.{newline} {newline} To do this, a player must speak to a magister/dark magister and request a ‘magic test, which will essentially ‘test the players aptitude for the winds of magic and allow you to make use of magic from then onwards.{newline} {newline} Magic and necromancy have tiers and progression, to grow stronger and access stronger spells you must use magic in battles and then speak to the magister relevant to your faction, for Necromancers or Dark magic users that would be the ‘Dark Magister whereas for Empire factions it would simply be ‘Magister. They can be found in cities and locations such as the College of Magic in Altdorf. {newline} Related Topics:{newline} {TOR_NECROMANCY} {TOR_MAGIC} {TOR_SPELLBOOK} {TOR_SPELLSELECTION} {TOR_ATTRIBUTES} {newline}

Necromancy: {newline} Necromancy provides an extra dynamic alongside all of the above, the ability to ‘raise the dead. Having access to these magics means that you will have the option to raise the dead after battles, to bolster your armies, as well as visit specific locations ( like {TOR_CURSEDLOCATIONS}) on the campaign map to recruit higher-tier undead units, such as wraiths. See{TOR_RAISEDEAD}).{newline}
Spell Book

The Spell Book: {newline} Accessed via the character screen the spell book stores all knowledge of magic, this includes companions in your party. There is information on the screen showing a characters magic abilities, such as their maximum winds of magic.{newline} {newline} All known and learnable spells are listed under their appropriate lore inside the spell book, which can be selected via the bookmark on the left side.{newline} {newline} The spell description can be read by hovering the mouse over the spells.
Spell Selection

When clicking on the spells inside the {TOR_SPELLBOOK} it is possible to add them to your selected combat spells, which will be usable the next time you are in combat. All other spells will not be visible during the fight, if no spell is selected then all spells are available.{newline}
Magic- and Holy Items

Usually with a purple background, magic items come with a special effect, which can be read by hovering over the blue icon at the bottom of a tooltip. Those magic items often amplify the wearers magical abilities or offer additional protection. The player can acquire them by visiting vendors around the Old World or winning battles against owners of such items.{newline}
Raise Dead

Certain characters and factions are able to raise the dead, or offer characters the ability to become undead. The player can access this by being a necromancer or playing as a vampire. {newline} {newline} Post battle resurrection{newline} Based on your inteligence level there is a chance that every living creature that died in a battle will become lesser undead warriors and join your army.{newline} {newline} Raiding Tombs{newline} As a necromancer you can also try your luck to resurrect undead in a local graveyard, found as a new option within villages. Of course this has some risk, as most of the ‘good factions will immediately dislike you, furthermore if you choose to try and raise undead in towns or villages, you may be caught by the locals and will have to fight to survive. {newline} {newline} Priests, and other careers are excluded from performing necromancy. {newline}
New Attribute and Skills

Discipline is an attribute made specifically for TOR, it contains three new core skills.{newline} {newline} Gunpowder:{newline} The Gunpowder skill accounts for weapons like pistols, handguns or even grenade-launching blunderbusses. For learning this skill, use gunpowder weapons, or read according to books (see {TOR_SKILLBOOKS}) to obtain the minimal requirement for most guns. Characters and gunpowder units inside a party will benefit from several perks and benefits directed to this new weapon type. Note, that for better artillery weapon capacities like cannons, the player needs to target Engineering instead of gunpowder.{newline} {newline} Spellcraft:{newline} The Spellcraft skill is restricted to all characters that are able to perform magic. Several perks will increase the characters magic capabilities or his use of knowledge about it. Skills are obtained via fighting with - and using magic in combat. New spells can be learned from spell trainers.{newline} {newline} Faith:{newline} Faith is restricted to all believing people in the old world. Necromancers and Vampires are excluded from this skill. Faith can be increased by praying at a shrine ( see religious Locations) or in the case of some priest careers, by performing prayers during battles. Faith increases the duration of blessings. {newline} {newline} {newline}
Religious Locations

Around the world, several locations can be found for Characters to receive blessings of the gods. The blessings provide buffs for the whole party. Praying at a shrine will attract religious units, like flagellants and battle pilgrims, which join the praying party. Note that the player as well as other Lords will be provided effects from praying at a shrine. Additionally, your devotion for a god rises whenever you pray at a shrine.{newline} {newline} In the current state 3 gods are implemented, which each provide their own unique blessings. {newline} {newline} Taal, the All-father of the human gods, the god of hunters, provides a movement buff inside of forests for the party.{newline} {newline} Sigmar, the Uniter of mankind, provides a health regeneration buff for heroes in parties.{newline} {newline} The Lady of the Lake provides a morale buff for all units within a party.{newline} {newline} Praying at a shrine is attached to the Faith skill and a higher faith skill will prolong the effects. New functions can also be unlocked, like “donations” which allow the player to increase renown by donating items to a shrine.{newline} {newline} {newline} {newline}
Skill Books

Skill books are another feature we have alongside the magisters, magister will sell them and very similar to Warband, you will passively read the book as you travel or rest and it will provide you with skill points at the end. They are sold for a fair amount so they arent easily accessed from the start of the game. {newline} {newline} To read them you must have the book inside your inventory. {newline} Hover your mouse until the full text appear. In the lower right corner a magnifying glass is visible. If you have not already read the book, a text will appear that will explain that you selected the book for reading. If you already know the book, it will inform you that you know the book already. If you let time pass ( move around or wait) you will read the contents of the books and your skill in the appropriate skill will be increased.{newline} {newline} Books cannot be read twice. {newline} {newline} {newline}

To start the game as a Vampire, you must choose the ‘Vampire nobility option during the character creation stage. When you load onto the campaign map your character will have the skin and powers of a vampire, such as access to magic, necromancy and in the future other abilities.{newline} {newline} If you want to become a Vampire after starting a game as a regular human, you will have to join the Vampire Counts and speak to Mannfred once you have enough Renown and enough standing with him. Alternatively, you have to be part of the Order of the Blood Dragon, and ask Walach Harkon to become a Blood Knight. Doing so will provide an option for you to ‘receive the blood kiss which will then change your character into a Vampire and gain a Blood Line Career. {newline} Vampires learn new magic through Dark Magister NPCs found in settlements, similar to normal magic users.{newline} {newline} {newline}
Priests and Prayers

Priest Careers and prayers{newline} Starting as a priest acolyte, or as a damsel of the lady, will make the player representative of the beliefs in the old world. They are the only careers and people that have access to prayers or battle prayers.{newline} {newline} {newline} Other than spells, prayers are directly unlocked upon reaching a certain skill level in the “Faith” skill. Starting with the adapt skill at the “Novice Prayer” prayer perk up to the “Grand prayer” perk at skill 125, new prayers will be unlocked. Non Priest career types, cannot unlock any prayers for combat but can receive the blessings from Religious Locations. {newline} {newline} Prayers are very powerful, to balance this the ability cooldown is shared across all prayers and is usually both long, and not immediately available. Of course, vampires and necromancers will also be blocked from access to such abilities. {newline} {newline} In the current state 8 prayers are accessible:{newline} {newline} Sigmar:{newline} - Healing hand: Troops inside an area get healed for 5 healthpoints per second for a total duration of 9 seconds.{newline} - Armour of the Righteous: Allies in a 3 meter target radius gain 35% physical resistance for 8 seconds.{newline} - Vanquish: Allies in a target radius gain a burning weapon trait, that ignites enemies and deals fire damage.{newline} - Comet of Sigmar: A projectile is launched at the enemy, dealing about 30 holy damage. The explosion can knock down enemies and dismount riders.{newline} {newline} {newline} Lady of the Lake{newline} - Aura of the Lady: Protects allies from magic fire and Lighnting Spell damage by 80% {newline} - Shield Of Combat: Adds 40% physical resistance against ranged damage for 15 seconds to the caster and surrounding friendly units.{newline} - Ladys Favour: Increaes attack speed for units inside an area by 25%. {newline} - Aerial Shield: Protects allies inside an area from ranged damage completely. {newline} {newline} {newline}
Text adventures

From time to time while travelling through the world, events can occur that need the action of the player. During the events, the game cant be saved and the story has to be finished before the game continues. {newline} {newline} Based on character skills and other attributes, like being a necromancer or vampire, the choices and approaches in the situation differ, as well the Chance of a positive outcome vary. The Outcome of the events can affect the world.{newline} {newline} These Events are triggered randomly and sometimes based on situations and the surrounding of the player. {newline} {newline} {newline}
